title: Social Entrepreneurship Innovation Design Course: Sustainable Project Development Using VR/AR and Open Resources

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Entrepreneurship Concepts and Experience with Digital Tools
context.additional_context: Focuses on social value creation projects immediately applicable in professional settings, providing mobile-optimized content in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can design solutions for social issues linked to the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) by applying the Architecture of Horizons methodology.
Learners can implement and demonstrate prototypes of social enterprise projects using VR/AR technology and interactive video.
Learners can collaboratively develop and apply social value evaluation metrics using open resource platforms.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
